INSERT INTO enterprise (enterprise_id, password, name, business_number, manager_name, manager_phone, category, up_count, resume_count, date)
VALUES (#{enterprise_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{business_number}, #{manager_name}, #{manager_phone}, #{category}, 0, 0, null )
mapper.select: select individual_id from individual where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
select enterprise_id from enterprise where manager_name=#{manager_name} and manager_phone=#{manager_phone}
mapper.update: update individual set password="1234" where individual_id=#{id} and phone=#{phone}
update enterprise set password="1234" where enterprise_id=#{enterprise_id} and manager_phone=#{manager_phone}
